fields.description: SysInfoWindows gets the current time in nanonseconds but assumes milliseconds.
fields.summary: Refresh time in SysInfoWindows is in nanoseconds

comments.body: When moving {{WindowsResourceCalculatorPlugin}} from YARN to Commons, the way to get the time changed. My proposal is to use {{Time.monotonicNow()}} which already does the translation from ns to ms.
First version of the patch to move ns into ms.

[~chris.douglas], [~kasha] as you guys were involved in HADOOP-12180, do you mind taking a look?
Not sure if there's a point on adding a unit test for this as it wouldn't run on Windows.

+1 lgtm. Agree this doesn't require a unit test; ran the TestSysInfo* tests, they passed on trunk/branch-2/branch-2.8.

Will commit when Jenkins comes back.
